numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that most major sports leagues consist mostly of players of color.
2. Major League Baseball is an exception.
3. I wonder why sports leagues decided only in recent years to diversify team leadership.
5. I am a person of color.
7. Most people in this city are minorities.
8. In this city, I can see how much progress exists in allowing people of color into sports leagues.
9. This does not mean that increasing diversity is accomplished.
10. This situation allows young children of color to hope.
11. This situation allows young children of color to see themselves as professional athletes.
12. The graph shows percentages of players of color in some major sports leagues.
13. The graph also shows percentages of head coaches of color in some major sports leagues.
14. The headline is: How people of color have diversified major sports leagues.
